overview: Born of a Breton father and a mother who lived through the fall of the Soviet Union, Adrian Herpe is a young pianist trained in the Ukrainian school. To hope one day to perform in prestigious concert halls, he will have to take a step to the West and join the benches of a European conservatory. His family, strangers to classical music, accompanies him from east to west on the road to success.
title: Le prélude d'Adrian
